text: Tanganyika is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its capital is Kalemie. The province was made in 2015 from part of the old Katanga Province. Territories are: * Kabalo Territory * Kalemie Territory, capital: Kalemie * Kongolo Territory * Manono * Moba Territory, capital: Moba, Democratic Republic of the Congo * Nyunzu ==References== Category:Provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2015 establishments in Africa
title: Tanganyika Province
